name: PhonemeInfo
desc: Defines a structure that stores information about a phoneme.

items.name: init(opcode: Int16, phStr: Str15, exampleStr: Str31, hiliteStart: Int16, hiliteEnd: Int16)
var exampleStr: Str31
items.desc: An example word that illustrates use of the phoneme.

items.name: var hiliteEnd: Int16
items.desc: The number of characters between the beginning of the example word and the end of the portion of that word representing the phoneme.

items.name: var hiliteStart: Int16
items.desc: The number of characters in the example word that precede the portion of that word representing the phoneme.

items.name: var phStr: Str15
items.desc: The string used to represent the phoneme. The string does not necessarily have a phonetic connection to the phoneme, but might simply be an abstract textual representation of it.
